channel.title: Small PSA
channel.description:
Varp=Player variable Varbit=Bit variable
also, varp=player save file varbit is just a way to compress the amount of information your save file holds and organize it in a logical manner. Im sure people knew this tho

Varbit=Bit variable

also, varp=player save file varbit is just a way to compress the amount of information your save file holds and organize it in a logical manner. Im sure people knew this tho
